headline.print_headline: For Money or Just to Strut, Living Out Loud on a Transgender Stage
headline.seo: In West Village, Living Out Loud on a Transgender Runway
headline.main: For Money or Just to Strut, Living Out Loud on a Transgender Stage

docs.snippet: When the weather gets warm, members of the gay and transgender community gather on Christopher Street after dark to promenade, air kiss, catcall or brawl....
docs.abstract: Christopher Street in Manhattan's West Village offers two distinctly different slices of New York life; one is the scene of the overpriced latte, designer shops and tourists; the other, which appears after nightfall all summer long, offers a place for members of the city's gay and transgender community to gather and live out loud (Series: Summer Nights).
docs.lead_paragraph: When the weather gets warm, members of the gay and transgender community gather on Christopher Street after dark to promenade, air kiss, catcall or brawl.

headline.print_headline: Louisville, Ky., Stakes Future on Care for Elderly
headline.seo: Louisville, Ky., Stakes Future on Care for Elderly
headline.main: Louisville, Ky., Stakes Future on Care for Elderly

docs.snippet: An office and laboratory building nearing completion in the central business district signals the expansion of Louisville’s biggest new economic sector....
docs.abstract: Office and laboratory building nearing completion in the central business district of Louisville, Ky, signals the expansion of the area's large new economic sector; 200,000 square-foot building will be the fourth, and largest, in the city's Nucleus Innovation Park, where the focus is on promoting new companies involved in care for older people; Louisville is taking the lead in the area of elder care.
docs.lead_paragraph: An office and laboratory building nearing completion in the central business district signals the expansion of Louisville’s biggest new economic sector.

docs.snippet: Mr. Dandapani, 54, is the president and chief operating officer of Apple Core Hotels, a privately run company that owns and operates five midpriced hotels in Midtown Manhattan....
docs.abstract: Vivian Marino 30-Minute Interview with Apple Core Hotels president and chief operating officer Vijay Dandapani; Apple Core Hotels is a privately run company that owns and operates five midpriced hotels in Midtown Manhattan.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Dandapani, 54, is the president and chief operating officer of Apple Core Hotels, a privately run company that owns and operates five midpriced hotels in Midtown Manhattan.

headline.print_headline: Sherman Hemsley, Star Of ‘Jeffersons,’ Dies at 74
headline.seo: Sherman Hemsley, Star of ‘The Jeffersons’ Dies at 74
headline.main: Sherman Hemsley, ‘Jeffersons’ Star, Is Dead at 74

docs.snippet: Mr. Hemsley was most famous for his role as the scrappy, nouveau riche George Jefferson on the hit 1970s sitcom....
docs.abstract: Sherman Hemsley, comic actor best-known for his role as George Jefferson on the hit television show The Jeffersons, dies at age 74.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Hemsley was most famous for his role as the scrappy, nouveau riche George Jefferson on the hit 1970s sitcom.

headline.print_headline: Euro’s Medicine May Be Making Greece’s Symptoms Worse
headline.seo: News Analysis — Euro Remedy for Greece Becomes Part of the Problem
headline.main: Euro’s Medicine May Be Making Greece’s Symptoms Worse

docs.snippet: Many experts say that the austerity targets set for Greece were unrealistic from the start and that compliance itself has harmed its economy....
docs.abstract: News analysis; growing number of experts say that austerity targets set for Greece were unrealistic and may be causing profound damage to the country's already weak economy; opinion about Greece's fate is increasingly divided among European leaders and even the country's own fragile coalition government.

byline.original: By RACHEL DONADIO and SUZANNE DALEY
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Dimitris Bounias from Athens, Nicholas Kulish from Berlin, Paul Geitner from Brussels and Jack Ewing from Frankfurt.

docs.lead_paragraph: Many experts say that the austerity targets set for Greece were unrealistic from the start and that compliance itself has harmed its economy.

docs.abstract: John Atta Mills, president of Ghana, dies at age 68.

docs.lead_paragraph: A respected if uncharismatic former law professor, Mr. Atta Mills presided over Ghana’s continuing experiment in stable democracy.

headline.print_headline: Brand Police Are on the Prowl for Ambush Marketers
headline.seo: 2012 London Games — Brand Police on Prowl for Nike and Other Ambush Marketers
headline.main: Brand Police Are on the Prowl for Ambush Marketers at London Games

docs.snippet: Every two years, the International Olympic Committee and the host city battle companies that want to bask in the Games’ prestige but have not paid to be an official sponsor....
docs.abstract: International Olympic Committee imposes more stringent rules to keep unofficial sponsors, like Nike, from using the Olympics in their advertising campaigns.
docs.lead_paragraph: Every two years, the International Olympic Committee and the host city battle companies that want to bask in the Games’ prestige but have not paid to be an official sponsor.

headline.print_headline: Ginny Tyler, 86, Mouseketeer And Voice of Disney Animals
headline.seo: Ginny Tyler, Mouseketeer on ‘Mickey Mouse Club,’ Dies at 86

docs.snippet: Ms. Tyler started her career as Mother Goose on children’s television and moved on to become a Disneyland Storyteller and Mouseketeer....
docs.abstract: Ginny Tyler, a Head Mouseketeer in the syndicated version of The Mickey Mouse Club of the 1960s and voice of many Disney characters for Disneyland Records, dies at age 86.
docs.lead_paragraph: Ms. Tyler started her career as Mother Goose on children’s television and moved on to become a Disneyland Storyteller and Mouseketeer.
